channel.title: [PI] Adding (costum) items? & a quick question
channel.description:
Hey.
Ive been working on a RSPS lately, and i'm planning on adding a few items. What i wish to add my server is: Ardy cloak, Arcane Stream and Chaotic Staff.
Could anyone explain it? Below, or thru teamviewer.
My msn: taurushelp@live.be
By the way, i'm using this source. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,511978.0.html
The quick question: There are some items in-game such as Zuriels that you can NOT buy in shops, how do i find the code of these items?

item.title: [PI] Adding (costum) items? & a quick question
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

NO COSTUM 4 U

Well you need to add the models to the place where they are loaded, and then add the ints in the correct class.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Adding (costum) items? & a quick question
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

first download the models u can find it on google or use the search bar by the model thread.
Then put the models .dat or what they are in you’re Cache “Raw” folder.
Then open up itemdef.java or itemdef2.java and u will see case #### with already added custom items like the green whips etc…
just add under a method you’re ints of the models.
You are done now compiler and reload client .
No problem for help

Read full topic
